thread.title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles Results

title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles Results
text: April 16, 2018 / 1:22 AM / Updated 13 hours ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Apr 16 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles matches on Sunday .. 1st Round .. 1-Rafael Nadal (ESP) (Bye) Karen Khachanov (RUS) beat Thanasi Kokkinakis (AUS) 7-5 6-4 5-Dominic Thiem (AUT) (Bye) 4-Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) (Bye) 6-David Goffin (BEL) (Bye) 7-Lucas Pouille (FRA) (Bye) Mischa Zverev (GER) beat Felix Auger-Aliassime 6-2 6-7(4) 6-1 (CAN) 3-Alexander Zverev (GER) (Bye) 8-Pablo Carreno Busta (Bye) (ESP) Daniil Medvedev (RUS) beat Marton Fucsovics (HUN) 6-7(4) 6-2 7-5 2-Marin Cilic (CRO) (Bye)
